movie.title: Sixty Six
movie.plot: A boy's barmitzvah looks set to be a disaster when it coincides with the 1966 World Cup Final.

movie.title: The Irishman
movie.plot: An aging hitman recalls his time with the mob and the intersecting events with his friend, Jimmy Hoffa, through the 1950-70s.
movie.awards: Nominated for 10 Oscars. Another 71 wins & 310 nominations.
